title: 97/398/EC: Commission Decision of 19 June 1997 repealing Decision 97/116/EC concerning certain protection measures relating to classical swine fever in Germany (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 19 June 1997 repealing Decision 97/116/EC concerning certain protection measures relating to classical swine fever in Germany (Text with EEA relevance) (97/398/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Member States shall amend the measures they apply to trade so as to bring them into compliance with this Decision. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 June 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
